name: MAZE LORD
description: Become the part of the legend and save the stolen princess!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP 64bit Processor: 1.6 GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 1024x768 resolution DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 512 MB available space Sound Card: On board
